'''Tom Loback''' ([[1949]] â€” [[5 March]] [[2015]]<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://theminiaturespage.com/boards/msg.mv?id=376955|articlename="Tom Loback RIP" Topic|dated=|website=[http://theminiaturespage.com/ theminiaturespage.com]|accessed=6 March 2015}}</ref>) was a linguist and artist from New York. His artwork has been published in ''[[Beyond Bree]]'', ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', ''[[Mythlore]]'', ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', ''[[Little Gwaihir]]'' and several other journals.<ref name=ELF>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.elvish.org/gwaith/tom_loback.htm|articlename=Tom Loback|dated=|website=ELF|accessed=6 March 2015}}</ref> He also had work in the ''[[Halls of the Elven-king]]'', a supplement in the [[Middle-earth Role Playing|MERP]] series.

His relevant artwork features [[tengwar]]-inscriptions in [[Quenya]] and [[Sindarin]].<ref name=ELF/>
